name: Flaw
description:
- They need workforce in the outer rim colonies.

That's what helped you make your mind. You could try your luck there and have a better life than in the polluted slums of Low-Earth. Instead you wake up lying on a cold stone table. Why are you here? The last thing you remember is travelling on board of the mining corporation's spaceship.

_____________________________________

This is only a demo, a test, to see if I am able to put together a simple FPS.

  • Retro FPS
  • Inspired by the retro FPS wave of the last years. And by the actual retro FPSs
  • hell, it have also (some of the) moves of DUSK dude

_____________________________________

As I am using an azerty keyboard layout, you might want to rebind the keys in the option menu.

The audio is still very early and I'm looking for artist willing to help !
